attributes.action: Dismiss the Home Secretary Jacqui Smith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What gives Ms. Smith the authority to blacklist American AM radio talkshow host Michael Savage and prohibit his travels to the U.K.?  She has clearly misinterpreted her role.  Are there not more dangerous persons?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
